introduction: “aespa：æpisode SYNK#1” 从出道曲 “Black Mamba” 开始，从第一张迷你专辑 “Savage”到 “Gils”，“MYWORLD” 和第四张迷你专辑 “Drama” 的MV和封面拍摄等，还有出道以来首次的独家演唱会aespa LIVE TOUR 2023 ‘SYNK：HYPER LINE' 的正篇和为迎接出道3周年而进行的 2023 aespa ‘MY DRAMA’ （粉丝见面会）的正片和幕后等，将以约424分钟的高清视频观看。DISC 01aespa LIVE TOUR 2023 ‘SYNK : HYPER LINE’ part 1DISC 02aespa LIVE TOUR 2023 ‘SYNK : HYPER LINE’ part 2[Black Mamba] Behind[Next Level] BehindThe 1st Mini Album [Savage] Behind[Life’s Too Short] BehindThe 2nd Mini Album [Girls] BehindDISC 032023 aespa FAN MEETING [MY DRAMA] part 1DISC 042023 aespa FAN MEETING [MY DRAMA] part 22023 aespa FAN MEETING [MY DRAMA] BehindThe 3rd Mini Album [MY WORLD] Behind[Better Things] BehindThe 4th Mini Album [Drama] Behind
